thread.title: The New Technologies Impacting Analytics & Business Intelligence: Join The Business Intelligence Innovation Summit in Chicago Next Month
thread.title_full: The New Technologies Impacting Analytics & Business Intelligence: Join The Business Intelligence Innovation Summit in Chicago Next Month - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The New Technologies Impacting Analytics & Business Intelligence: Join The Business Intelligence Innovation Summit in Chicago Next Month
text:
New Business Intelligence technologies have made it possible to process large amounts of data in real-time, enabling businesses to make decisions quickly and gain ground on the competition. These game-changing technologies within the analytics industry will be the focus of the Business Intelligence Innovation Summit, hosted by Innovation Enterprise in Chicago this November 11 & 12.
Chicago, IL
Traditional Business Intelligence is becoming less useful as new technologies allow businesses to process large amounts of data in real-time, giving them the ability to respond to customers with immediate information and solutions. These new technologies are changing the world of advertising. Despite the new channels for media consumption, traditional television advertising continues to remain the medium with the largest advertising spend.
The Business Intelligence Innovation Summit will unite 25+ industry leading speakers and 100+ high-level analytics executives over two days of interactive discussion, engaging workshops and unparalleled networking opportunities. This summit is known for its interactive nature, connecting attendees with leading organizations, and offering a unique platform to share and discuss key challenges.
Summit keynote speaker Bob Bress, Senior Director, Product management & Analytics, Visible World, will look at how new applications are changing the world of advertising, allowing for precision targeting and up-to-the minute data. Keynote speaker Slim Baltagi, Senior Manager, Big Data Engineering for Capital One, will discuss the changing role of business intelligence through a case study showing how new technologies, such as Fast Data and Real-Time Steam, can help businesses react quickly to the events that are occurring at a faster pace in real-time.
In addition to Visible World and Capital One, speakers from Yellow Pages, Amtrak, eBay, Time Inc and many more will share their expertise on turning data information into actionable insight.
“As organizations develop the capacity to gain greater insight from data and statistics along with the increase in the volume of data available it is now essential to use innovative practices to succeed,” said Alex Lane, International Events Director at the Innovation Enterprise. “The summit will focus on how companies can implement the new business intelligence technologies and achieve faster analysis of data to enable a quick turnaround in decision making.”
Use the exclusive discount code PR100 to save $100 on all two-day passes. For a complete list of speakers, agenda, and registration details, please visit: http://theinnovationenterprise.com/summits/business-intelligence-innovation-summit-chicago-2015
##
About Innovation Enterprise :
Innovation Enterprise, a CFO Publishing company is an independent business-to-business multi-channel media brand focused on the information needs of Senior Finance, Operations, Analytics, Big Data, Strategy, Digital, Innovation & Sports executives. Products include IE.Summits, ieOnDemand, ieWebinars, ieWhitepapers & more.
Whether it's delivered online, or in person, everything Innovation Enterprise produces reflects the company's unshakeable belief in the power of information to spur innovation.
